data.title: Who's turn now?
data.statement:
Eve and Squeak is playing Tic Tac Toe, they played halfway and take a rest. When they come back, they forget whose turn now?! Fortunately, they still remember what symbol they use.

The Tic Tac Toe rules:
1. Each player place their mark one by one (either {{X}} or {{O}})
2. {{X}} always go first
3. {{.}} represent empty cell

Output the mark that suppose to be placed now.
If the board is full and valid output {{Game over}}
If the board is invalid, output {{Invalid}}
You don't need to care if one of them already win.

Can you help them find out who is supposed to play this turn now?

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
X O X
O X O
. . X

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
O X O
X X O
O X .

testCases.title: Game over
testCases.testIn:
O X O
X X O
X O X

testCases.title: Validator 8
testCases.testIn:
O X X
X X O
O O X

testCases.title: Invalid game over
testCases.testIn:
X O X
X X O
O O O

testCases.title: Validator 9
testCases.testIn:
X O X
X O X
O X X

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Eve and Squeak is playing Tic Tac Toe, they played halfway and take a rest. When they come back, they forget whose turn now?! Fortunately, they still remember what symbol they use.

The Tic Tac Toe rules:
1. Each player place their mark one by one (either X or O)
2. X always go first
3. . represent empty cell

Output the mark that suppose to be placed now.
If the board is full and valid output Game over
If the board is invalid, output Invalid
You don't need to care if one of them already win.

Can you help them find out who is supposed to play this turn now?
Input
Line 1-3: 3 space separated characters (either X, O or .)
Output
X, O, Game over or Invalid
Constraints
Example
Input
X O X
. . .
. . .
Output
O
